title: (x) Donata? - Futura {Stephen, Hrant}
content:
Anyone ever hear of a font named "Donata" ? A client is requesting it and I can't say I've ever heard of it.   
   
So far my searches haven't proven fruitful...   
   
jb
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
Just got this sample. Any takers?   
   
 ![donata](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051821im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/your_image.gif)

Just got this sample. Any takers?   
   
 ![donata](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051821im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/2014.jpg)

Looks like a Futura Book copy to me.   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/Testdrive?id=10152&s=One+day+Little+Johnny+is+in+his+back&p=36&submit=Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051821/http:/www.myfonts.com/Testdrive?id=10152&s=One%2Bday%2BLittle%2BJohnny%2Bis%2Bin%2Bhis%2Bback&p=36&submit=Display)

Looks like a Futura with long extenders, no?   
(I think in fact Futura came with a small x-height originally.)   
   
hhp

Apparently Donata is a part of this package by Broderbund:   
   
 [http://www.broderbund.com/Product.asp?OID=4147965&SC=012005601](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051821/http:/www.broderbund.com/Product.asp?OID=4147965&SC=012005601)
